explanation: [0-0] The screen is divided into three parts. The upper and lower parts are black, and in the middle part, a young man in a black shirt and a young woman in a white shirt are sitting by a round table. There is a glass turntable on the round table, with dishes and a box of cigarettes on it. The woman is holding a pair of chopsticks in her right hand, and the man is resting his chin on his right hand, looking ahead. There are subtitles at the top of the screen.

[0-4] The woman in the white shirt gets up with chopsticks and quickly pushes the box of cigarettes on the table to the man next to her. Then the camera zooms in, and the man puts the box of cigarettes in his pants pocket.

[0-4] The woman in the white shirt gets up with chopsticks and quickly pushes the box of cigarettes on the table to the man next to her. Then the camera zooms in, and the man puts the box of cigarettes in his pants pocket.

[4-12] Then the man in the black shirt puts his hands in front of him, looking forward, then clasps his hands and puts his arms on the table. The woman in the white shirt next to him is putting food into her mouth with chopsticks. Then the camera zooms in. The woman kicks a box of wine to the man's feet with her foot. The man hurriedly clamps the wine between his feet, then kicks the box of wine under his stool with his heel. Then the camera zooms out. The man's face appears very calm. Then he puts his right hand on his chin, looks forward, and then turns his head to the right.
